Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] Pg.2 King's Announcement\\\<br/\\\>Pg.3 Lothario's Execution\\\<br/\\\>Pg.4 Rosalina's Bakery and The Old Market\\\<br/\\\>Pg.5 Arafel's Monthly Cooking Recipe \\\<br/\\\>Pg.6 Events\\\<br/\\\>Pg.7 Crimes\\\<br/\\\>Pg.8 Riddles,Games,and Contests.\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>
X[S] The Herald Volume 1

X[S] King Dominic clearly orates to Strada Principale, "Thank you all for coming on such short notice. These are dark times we have entered and there is a stain upon these streets. \\\<br/\\\> Know, my citizens, that we are working diligently to get to the bottom of this terrible series of events."The Crown will continue to work diligently and we will not rest until we have rooted this evil from the shadows where it sleeps. And our justice will be swift."In one week's time, the criminal known to use as Lothario Lorenzo will be accused and face justice by the will of the Crown whom he so grievously wounded.God is merciful but we are merciful and firm. \\\<br/\\\> This will not be tolerated. Those who have evil designs; take this as warning. Those who are pure, take this as solace.The criminal will die here on these steps for his crimes in one week's time. Such is our mercy and justice. Such is the decree of the Crown.God go with you and take our promise to bring Justice to those who treat our citizens and guests with such violence and hate. The speech concluded and the crowd left back to their respective ventures. \\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>
X[S] Kings Announcement on 2/6/1600

X[S] Lothario was placed before the citadel on February the 13th 1600. When Lothario entered the execution area he threw a red silk ribbon to a group of onlookers. A tense energy pervaded the area and within minds of those in attendance. King Dominic rose his voice to Lothario and the crowd asking how he plead. Lothario with a mixture of bravery and great fear admitted to the crimes and plead guilty. King Dominic then decrees with his articulate words, "For your crimes, by the will and testament of the Crown, you are sentenced to death!King Dominic also warned "May your death be a warning to all those who would so act against the Crown of Italy; our justice will always prevail!"\\\<br/\\\> Father Mattissimo gave Lothario his final rite and the executioner swung his axe. Lothario before meeting his death yelled "The pigeon also flies! Like the dove...always home. The axe then separated his head from his body. This led several in the crowd to believe yet another attack was imminent and began to arm themselves. Two massive crowds began to form one in support of the king and another angry with the execution of Lothario. The crowds were dispersed by the Royal Guard.
X[S] Lothario's Execution 2/13/16

X[S] Where the English Consulate and Potter and Hobbes stands, used to be a different structure entirely. The Potter and Hobbes shop was Rosalina's Bakery, which was the premiere spot for sweet goods. Many locals recollect Rosalina's sweet rolls and caramel pies which left vivid memories. It was a family owned business passed down from generation to generation. After Rosalina could no longer work, and the business was passed to her son Decimus. The business had to close due to unforeseen circumstances and the smell of baked goods have been sorely missed.\\\<br/\\\> The English Manor used to be home to a giant market. Crafters,Entertainers, and customers alike would flood to this spot to enjoy the market. Children could often be seen playing and running in their mirthful youth. Wares of any kind were displayed with a near limitless variety. It was one of the city's spots that came alive with the roar of others. The history behind the city is not something to be forgotten and shows the roots of blending culture.\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>
X[S] Rosalina's Bakery and The Old Market: The History Behind The Manor's Grounds

X[S] Crab Boil Recipe\\\<br/\\\>4 live crabs from the butchers (Can substitute any seafood of your liking)\\\<br/\\\>2 quarts of milk\\\<br/\\\>1 gallon of water\\\<br/\\\>4 onions, quartered \\\<br/\\\>8 sausages sliced\\\<br/\\\>8 Potatoes\\\<br/\\\>1 sprig of Thyme\\\<br/\\\>1 sprig of Sage\\\<br/\\\>1. Bring a large pot of water and milk to a boil; add potatoes, sausages, onions, corn, and seafood seasoning. Cook mixture at a boil until the potatoes are cooked through, about 30 minutes\\\<br/\\\>2.Gently drop crabs into the boiling mixture; cook until the crab meat is cooked through, at least 10 minutes. Drain water and enjoy!\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>
X[S] Arafel's Monthly Cooking Recipe

X[S] French Embassy: The Feast of St. Valentine Dance\\\<br/\\\>The 23rd of February at 9 o’clock in the evening. Games, refreshments and music will be provided by the French. For this occasion, we will gather at the Grand Salon off Piazza Vecchia. At the close of the event, we invite late night revelers to join us in the adjacent lounge for additional refreshment.\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>English Embassy: Toga Party on the 28th of February. We will be starting the party at 9 pm and ask those who wish to come to bring a mask and a donation to give to those who are less fortunate. With all of the attacks and seeping darkness lately, a lighthearted party might be just what we all need. The party is open to the public and requires suitable clothes underneath the toga.\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>The English Consulate is hosting an Award show for the city. There will be several different categories. We are tentatively planning for April 10th with more information to come within the month.\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>Gentlemen's Club March 3rd at 9pm\\\<br/\\\>Gentlemen in good standing with the Crown are invited to join us for drinks, smokes, and general merriment on the first and third Tuesday of every month in the lounge of the Grand Salon in Piazza Vecchia. We will convene at approximately 9 o’clock in the evening and carry on until we become tired of each other’s conversation. Please write to Count Jean-Frederic de Marigny or Lord Nicolas Beaumont with interest, question, or other.\\\<br/\\\>
X[S] Events

X[S] The German Embassy is seeking any information regarding the defacement of their garden and theft of their plants. Please send any information to Chief Matteo of the city guard or Lord and Lady Alderhard of the German Consulate.\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>English Consulate's Ambassador Arafel Belator is seeking help in finding his lost peg. It is reported that a large number of dogs overwhelmed him ,stole the peg from his person, and fled the scene. He describes it as an ash peg, most likely with chew marks. If you have any information please send a missive to Ambassador Belator.\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>
X[S] Crimes

X[S] Games:\\\<br/\\\>Try to say this three times fast Half a haft, quarter staff\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>Bad Jokes:\\\<br/\\\>These Giant Squid jokes are Kraken me up -Paul from the Hair Salon\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>Long fairy tales have a tendency to dragon\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>They wrote a book all about clocks. It's about time\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>What did the buffalo say when his son left for his apprenticeship? Bison\\\<br/\\\>\\\<br/\\\>Riddle for a 2 florin prize:\\\<br/\\\>If two snakes marry, what will their towels say?
X[S] Jokes,Games,and Riddles
"Arafel"
"1581652587 Arafel[zorkbork]"
